verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֔י <WH8066> And it came to pass on the eighth קָרָ֣א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> [that] Moses לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons וּלְזִקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron קַח־ <WH3947> Take לְ֠ךָ עֵ֣גֶל <WH5695> calf בֶּן־ <WH1121> afflicted בָּקָ֧ר <WH1241> bull לְחַטָּ֛את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <WH352> and a ram לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering תְּמִימִ֑ם <WH8549> without blemish וְהַקְרֵ֖ב <WH7126> and offer לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> [them] before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְאֶל־ <WH413> then בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> And unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קְח֤וּ <WH3947> Take שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> ye a kid עִזִּים֙ <WH5795> of the goats לְחַטָּ֔את <WH2403> for a sin offering וְעֵ֨גֶל <WH5695> and a calf וָכֶ֧בֶשׂ <WH3532> and a lamb בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> [both] of the first שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year תְּמִימִ֖ם <WH8549> without blemish לְעֹלָֽה׃ <WH5930> for a burnt offering

וְשׁ֨וֹר <WH7794> Also a bullock וָאַ֜יִל <WH352> and a ram לִשְׁלָמִ֗ים <WH8002> for peace offerings לִזְבֹּ֙חַ֙ <WH2076> to sacrifice לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וּמִנְחָ֖ה <WH4503> and a meat offering בְּלוּלָ֣ה <WH1101> mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <WH8081> with oil כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> for to day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> will appear אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּקְח֗וּ <WH3947> And they brought אֵ֚ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> [that] which Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַֽיִּקְרְבוּ֙ <WH7126> drew near כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> and all the congregation וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses זֶ֧ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> which the LORD תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> that ye should do וְיֵרָ֥א <WH7200> shall appear אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH413> about כְּב֥וֹד <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron קְרַ֤ב <WH7126> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> unto the altar וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <WH6213> and offer אֶת־ <WH853> חַטָּֽאתְךָ֙ <WH2403> thy sin offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֣לָתֶ֔ךָ <WH5930> and thy burnt offering וְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> and make an atonement בַּֽעַדְךָ֖ <WH1157> about וּבְעַ֣ד <WH1157> and for הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> for thyself and for the people וַעֲשֵׂ֞ה <WH6213> and offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבַּ֤ן <WH7133> the offering הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people וְכַפֵּ֣ר <WH3722> and make an atonement בַּֽעֲדָ֔ם <WH1157> about כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> for them as the LORD

וַיִּקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> therefore went אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> unto the altar וַיִּשְׁחַ֛ט <WH7819> and slew אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥גֶל <WH5695> the calf הַחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לֽוֹ׃

וַ֠יַּקְרִבוּ <WH7126> brought בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> And the sons אַהֲרֹ֣ן <WH175> of Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּם֮ <WH1818> the blood אֵלָיו֒ <WH413> to him וַיִּטְבֹּ֤ל <WH2881> unto him and he dipped אֶצְבָּעוֹ֙ <WH676> his finger בַּדָּ֔ם <WH1818> in the blood וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and put עַל־ <WH5921> on קַרְנ֣וֹת <WH7161> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֣ם <WH1818> out the blood יָצַ֔ק <WH3332> and poured אֶל־ <WH413> at יְס֖וֹד <WH3247> at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֵ֨לֶב <WH2459> But the fat וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּלָיֹ֜ת <WH3629> and the kidneys וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיֹּתֶ֤רֶת <WH3508> and the caul מִן־ <WH4480> above הַכָּבֵד֙ <WH3516> the liver מִן־ <WH4480> at הַ֣חַטָּ֔את <WH2403> of the sin offering הִקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> he burnt הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> upon the altar כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> And the flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָע֑וֹר <WH5785> and the hide שָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> with fire מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> the camp

וַיִּשְׁחַ֖ט <WH7819> And he slew אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <WH4672> presented בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> and Aaron's אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> unto him the blood וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <WH2236> which he sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֗ה <WH5930> the burnt offering הִמְצִ֧יאוּ <WH4672> And they presented אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> to him לִנְתָחֶ֖יהָ <WH5409> unto him with the pieces וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7218> thereof and the head וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <WH6999> and he burnt עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> [them] upon the altar

וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> And he did wash אֶת־ <WH853> הַקֶּ֖רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּרָעָ֑יִם <WH3767> and the legs וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> and burnt עַל־ <WH5921> with הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> [them] upon the burnt offering הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> on the altar

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <WH7126> And he brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> קָרְבַּ֣ן <WH7133> offering הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people's וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂעִ֤יר <WH8163> the goat הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> which [was] the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לָעָ֔ם <WH5971> for the people וַיִּשְׁחָטֵ֥הוּ <WH7819> and slew וַֽיְחַטְּאֵ֖הוּ <WH2398> it and offered it for sin כָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> as the first
וַיַּקְרֵ֖ב <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וַֽיַּעֲשֶׂ֖הָ <WH6213> and offered כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> it according to the manner

וַיַּקְרֵב֮ <WH7126> And he brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָה֒ <WH4503> the meat offering וַיְמַלֵּ֤א <WH4390> and took כַפּוֹ֙ <WH3709> an handful מִמֶּ֔נָּה <WH4480> some וַיַּקְטֵ֖ר <WH6999> thereof and burnt עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> [it] upon the altar מִלְּבַ֖ד <WH905> beside עֹלַ֥ת <WH5930> the burnt sacrifice הַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> of the morning

וַיִּשְׁחַ֤ט <WH7819> He slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַשּׁוֹר֙ <WH7794> also the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> and the ram זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> [for] a sacrifice הַשְּׁלָמִ֖ים <WH8002> of peace offerings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לָעָ֑ם <WH5971> which [was] for the people וַ֠יַּמְצִאוּ <WH4672> presented בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> and Aaron's אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> unto him the blood אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וַיִּזְרְקֵ֥הוּ <WH2236> which he sprinkled עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <WH2459> And the fat מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשּׁ֑וֹר <WH7794> of the bullock וּמִן־ <WH4480> and from הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> and of the ram הָֽאַלְיָ֤ה <WH451> the rump וְהַֽמְכַסֶּה֙ <WH4374> and that which covereth וְהַכְּלָיֹ֔ת <WH3629> [the inwards] and the kidneys וְיֹתֶ֖רֶת <WH3508> and the caul הַכָּבֵֽד׃ <WH3516> [above] the liver

וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> And they put אֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <WH2459> the fat עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶחָז֑וֹת <WH2373> upon the breasts וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> and he burnt הַחֲלָבִ֖ים <WH2459> the fat הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> upon the altar

וְאֵ֣ת <WH853> הֶחָז֗וֹת <WH2373> And the breasts וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִ֔ין <WH3225> and the right הֵנִ֧יף <WH5130> waved אַהֲרֹ֛ן <WH175> Aaron תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> as Moses

וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lifted up אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶת־ <WH853> [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָ֛יו <WH3027> able ק) אֶל־ <WH413> toward הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> toward the people וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֑ם <WH1288> and blessed וַיֵּ֗רֶד <WH3381> them and came down מֵעֲשֹׂ֧ת <WH6213> from offering הַֽחַטָּ֛את <WH2403> of the sin offering וְהָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> and the burnt offering וְהַשְּׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> and peace offerings

וַיָּבֹ֨א <WH935> went מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> And Moses וְאַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> and Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> into אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַיֵּ֣צְא֔וּ <WH3318> and came out וַֽיְבָרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> and blessed אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> the people וַיֵּרָ֥א <WH7200> appeared כְבוֹד־ <WH3519> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> unto all the people

וַתֵּ֤צֵא <WH3318> And there came אֵשׁ֙ <WH784> a fire מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> out from before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַתֹּ֙אכַל֙ <WH398> and consumed עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> upon the altar אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֲלָבִ֑ים <WH2459> and the fat וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> [which] when all the people וַיָּרֹ֔נּוּ <WH7442> they shouted וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <WH5307> and fell עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> on their faces
